title: Russian Shelling Halts Ukrainian Evacuation Effort
sub_head: One convoy is able to flee the besieged city of Sumy, while humanitarian crisis deepens in Mariupol as fighting continues and relief efforts fail
body:
Ukraine managed to evacuate a convoy of civilians from the besieged northeastern city of Sumy on Tuesday, but renewed Russian shelling at the cityâ€™s exit forced the effort to be halted. Local authorities said the evacuation would resume later in the day.
Heavy fighting continued across the country, particularly in the southeastern city of Mariupol, where evacuation efforts failed for the fourth day in a row and residents have gone without power or water supply for over a week.
